name: Tower Tether
description:
Roguelike Card Tower Defense

Controls:

WASD to move map. QE to zoom up and down.

Mouse Click to draw cards from deck and use cards in hand.

How to:

Action points can be generated from resource towers and naturally every interval.

Use Action points to draw cards from your deck, and use those cards to place towers.

Towers placed will form walls with nearest towers placed, levelling both of them if they are equal in level.

Blobs spawned across the map, and will combine when near each other. Defend your main base.
